  <mi>F</mi>
  <mi>V</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">FV</annotation></semantics></math> = $100,000, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

questionSetStimulus:
In the following exercises, find the present value for the given future value, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>F</mi>
  <mi>V</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">FV</annotation></semantics></math>, annual simple interest rate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r</annotation></semantics></math>, and number of years <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>t</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">t</annotation></semantics></math>.
